file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-25-07-04 - ATTENDANT-CALL PANEL ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ATTENDANT-CALL PANEL ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the attendant-call panel assembly. B. The attendant-call panel is installed outside the LH forward partition of the toilet compartment. It gives the attendant a visual indication when there is a call from the pilot or from a passenger. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ATTENDANT-CALL PANEL ASSEMBLY - ALL 33-25-07-000-801-A REMOVAL ATTENDANT CALL-PANEL ASSEMBLY - ALL 33-25-07-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-25-07 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ATTENDANT-CALL PANEL ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the attendant-call panel assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 261 Toilet forward partition, LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2 - RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3). J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (4). (2) Remove the attendant call panel (3). (3) Carefully pull the base assembly (2). (4) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the base assembly (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-07 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Remove the base assembly (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-07 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

BASE ASSEMBLY 3. ATTENDANT CALL PANEL DET. B 4. SCREW (2) 145AMM330538.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-07 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ATTENDANT CALL-PANEL ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the attendant-call panel assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 READING AND ATTENDANT CALL LIGHTS (1) - OP- AMM TASK 33-25-00-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 261 Toilet forward partition, LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the base assembly (2). (2) Carefully put the base assembly (2) in its installation position. (3) Put the attendant call panel (3) in position. (4) Install the screws (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-25-07 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), close the RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2 - RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3). (2) Do the Reading-and-Attendant-Call Lights test ( AMM TASK 33-25-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-25-07 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
